name: Crime gang in mad Miami
description:
Again Welcome to Miami, crime capital of America!
This is the continuation of the criminal saga, which is so fond of gamers from around the world! So be ready to sink in new dangerous trip through the crime city in open-world action game!
We greatly expanded the map, combining the cities from several of our games.

For those who like to crash cars, we prepared indestructible tank with endless stocks of shells.

Grand tough guy will have enough meta for criminal exploits.

This app includes:
- Crime simulator
- Beautiful Miami
- Thief auto on streets with throwing driver out of auto - Banks and offices robbery
- Race in city and out
- Fights with fists and kick
- Many blows
- Moto, cars, auto, tanks, helicopters
- Interesting rap hip hop music
- Fun animations
- Interesting car theft
- Elements of Shooter game
- Elements of Strategy game
- Secret missions with cheat code
- Mad streets full of vice and sins

Our app puts the dark, intriguing and ruthless world of the city’s street crimes on your phones. You can tackle 7 different types of motor vehicle theft missions to take over the city and outrun the police.

Make your way through 50 MISSIONS filled with action Build up a gangster band to take over Miami and win mafia wars!

Download game for free and win the mafia war between city gangster bands
